segments.text: Madam , is everything set up for your trip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet . I seem to move my house to that place . You don't know how tight the schedule is for this trip .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Correct ! I have three-day visit to Shanghai on December 10th .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like a single room with a bath for two nights . Can you help me to reserve a hotel room for me ?
segments.speaker: S2
